content: Yes, some of these equestrian centers offer more advanced riding lessons for experienced riders. For example, Les Ecuries de la Charnie offers advanced-level jumping lessons, dressage training, and training for competition. Club Hippique du Buissonnet also offers dressage training and jumping lessons for advanced riders, in addition to horse riding lessons for beginners. It's suggested to directly contact these equestrian centers or check their websites for more information on their services and availability.
